brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts a person configuring a router. The commands used to configure the router are listed below:

R1 (config) # IP access-list extended SALES-ONLY
R1 (config-ext-n ACL) # permit IP 192.168.1.66 0.0.0.0 any
R1 (config-ext-n ACL) # permit IP 192.168.1.77 0.0.0.0 any

R1 (config) #interface F A 0 /0
R1 (config-if) # IP access-group SALES-ONLY in
